comment: From mehnga phone to mehenge dreams, everything is rich about Pranav Dada😎. "Patil chala" my go to person anytime anywhere 😀. Aur Bhai ja rahe hai ham kabhi toh ghumne 😂. Keep hustling Bhai...
name: Rahul Raut

comment: Haan Bhai pata chal gya ki tu uth gya. 69 reels bhejne ki jarurat nahin hai😂. Pro Photographer📷. Island khareedenge apan 11 log milkar💪😂. All the best❤️
name: Devesh Jindal

comment: Cheers to my best bro from CSE 🥂. May you fulfill all your goals. Jaldi jaldi start-up khol le uske bad mai funding lene aaunga...🤧
name: Imon Jyoti Patar

comment: Bhai, konse anime chal rahi abhi? Gojo wapas aya ki nahi? Mast bande ho Pranav bhai, hamesha chill aur happy vibes rediate karte ho, phir apne skills mai toh top ho hi, aise hi rahna bro, bholna mat, aur yaad rakhna America  bewakoof country hai badalna mat 😂. ATB for your future endeavors.
name: Rishi Parsai

comment: Mast bande ho pranav bhai. Itna kuch share kra h saath me ki samajh hi nhi aa rha kya kya likhun. Movies, anime, jokes n so much more. "Aaja bhai oreo shake peete hai😂" Bas bhai sab kuch record krke mat rakha kr yrr. Best of luck bhai❤
name: Rishabh Sharma

comment: Pranav gya nhi tu Sumit ke sath night canteen. Inter IIT aur T vs M were the best time we had. Aur tera aur sumit night canteen ke name pr chupke se bhag jana sb yad rahega. 😂😂
name: LOKESH KORSANE

comment: Videographer of our group. Mauka mila nahi shoot karna start 😅. Only person jiske saath project karke pata chala group me aur bhi koi kaam karta ha😂. Best of luck bhai❤.
name: Harshit Pachar

comment: One the few Patils I know just more richer and cooler than the others😎.  The most consistent person in sharing reels 😉. Bhai ek oreo shake ki factory khol le fir tyacha aila zindagi mai koi tension hi nahi (btw just gave you a nice startup idea). Bas aise hi netflix dekhta reh aur khush reh.
name: Prathmesh Patil

comment: Cool guy with a constant smile. I can still remember the pondi trip and gossips in walmart. Apan toh milte hi rahenge😂
name: Rounak Jain

comment: Bhai to apna brand h,jo bhi karta h mje se krta h, chahe gym m exercise,exam hall m likhna, ya har meal ke baad ice cream/cold coffe. 🏋️‍♂️📝😂.Aur jo tu reels bhejega to react to krna pdega na bhai😂akhir patil brand ho. walmart me to milenge hi 🤝.All the Best..(gym m back marna mat bhoolna 😂)
name: Dishesh Singh Chaudhary

comment: Koi bhi meme ho, bhai ki nazro se koi bach paya hai kya. Dark humor ko normal humor banane vala insaan hai ye. Bhai din mai paise na kharch kare toh iska kahana digest nhi hota. Night canteen ki boori aadat lagayi hai isne. Bhaichara on top, we will make paise chappan di machine one day😂
name: Harsh Wardhan Dohaiya

comment: Pranav, the Bambani of our crew, always on point with those movie requests, even in the middle of exams! And your dedication to anime? Truly legendary, my friend. Keep the entertainment flowing! 🎬🍿📺
name: Saurabh Kumar Singh

comment: Bande ne college ke chaar saal hasne mein hi nikaal diye! 😄 Ek raat mein koi bhi anime khatam karne ka vardaan hai bhai ko. Humbleness mein kehta hai college life mein kuch nahi padha, lekin sach toh yeh hai ki woh group ka sabse behtar developer hai. 👨‍💻 Chalo bhai, ek Kitkat shake ho jaye? 🥤
name: Mayank Tayal

comment: From sharing in my joys to comforting me in my sorrows, you've been my constant companion through every twist and turn of life's journey.I will miss having you by my side every day, Thanks for having me In your Life Bhaiya ❤️
name: Devarapalli Nissi
